name: postman-automation-framework
description: Comprehensive Postman automation framework with Newman and GitHub Actions integration

scripts.test:dev: newman run collections/api-tests.postman_collection.json -e environments/dev.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,htmlextra,json,junit --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/dev-report.html --reporter-json-export reports/dev-results.json --reporter-junit-export reports/dev-results.xml
scripts.test:qa: newman run collections/api-tests.postman_collection.json -e environments/qa.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,htmlextra,json,junit --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/qa-report.html --reporter-json-export reports/qa-results.json --reporter-junit-export reports/qa-results.xml
scripts.test:staging: newman run collections/api-tests.postman_collection.json -e environments/staging.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,htmlextra,json,junit --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/staging-report.html --reporter-json-export reports/staging-results.json --reporter-junit-export reports/staging-results.xml
scripts.test:prod: newman run collections/api-tests.postman_collection.json -e environments/prod.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,htmlextra,json,junit --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/prod-report.html --reporter-json-export reports/prod-results.json --reporter-junit-export reports/prod-results.xml
scripts.test:all: npm run test:dev && npm run test:qa && npm run test:staging
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run install:newman && npm run install:newman-html
